segments.text: Can you help me do an internet search ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . What do you want to find ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to find information on World War Two .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , can you be more specific ? There are a lot of websites about that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I want to know about the Normandy Landing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . Well , go to www.google.com , and type in Normandy Landing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , wow ! There are lot of sites .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here , try this one . It's a good site about Normandy Landing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: For detailed information , however , you should read a history book .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . If I am interested , I'll go to the library .
segments.speaker: S1
